snippet.title: Puzzle Journey - PlayStation 4 Gameplay
snippet.description:
Another day, another low-effort shovelware game to artificially boost one's PSN trophy collection with an easy platinum trophy. But luckily, the game itself is free with no microtransactions. That and it's not from Sabec this time. Developed and published by ERIK GAMES on September 2023, Puzzle Journey is basically a game of memory where you have to find pairs. The game has four difficulty modes, with harder ones having more cards and pairs to find. All you simply do to get the platinum is to complete each difficulty, find specific pairs (probably to pad out the trophy list) and to beat the said difficulty modes as quickly as possible and using less moves as possible.

For something as simple as this, it frankly it would have worked better as a mobile app. But since this is released for free and the platinum trophy can be earned in at least an hour, you could do a whole lot worse.

#ps4 #playstation4 #ps5 #playstation5 #playstationstore #puzzlejourney #erikgames #indies #indiegames #freeps4games #freegames #freebies
